site_meta_data.title: Bharghav's Blog
site_meta_data.author: Bharghav
site_meta_data.description: Bharghav's coding journey - Work and life stories through the keyboard of an open-minded Software Engineer

name: Bharghav
bio_1: Back in 2020, I made a significant leap, transitioning from a commerce background to immerse myself in the world of coding.
bio_2: Every day, Chennai's vibrant culture and landscapes fuel my inspiration.
bio_3: I embarked on my professional journey as an AI intern, diving deep into chatbots before evolving into a full-stack web developer.
bio_4: Currently, I'm deeply engrossed in JS/TS technologies and crafting innovative eCommerce solutions.
bio_5: I have a penchant for blending hardware with software, often tinkering with projects involving Arduino and Raspberry Pi.
bio_6: Being a tech aficionado, I've created home automation systems and manage my personal homelab server.
bio_7: But my passions aren't just confined to tech. Embracing the life of a digital nomad, I combine coding with my love for travel.
bio_8: Music is another love. A multi-instrumentalist at heart, I'm adept with the flute, violin, and keyboard.
bio_9: When it comes to gaming, the PS5 is my sanctuary.
bio_10: On the move, I'm an enthusiastic cyclist, always seeking out new adventures on the horizon.
bio_11: The world of investments intrigues me, always on the prowl for opportunities in stocks, cryptocurrencies, or grasping the intricacies of financial markets.
bio_12: But if there's one thing that defines me: I never cease to learn, build, and chase new adventures.
bio_start_coding: I made my foray into coding in 2020, and it's been an exhilarating journey since.
bio_first_job: My career took off as an AI intern, with chatbots as my initial muse.
bio_passion: I'm deeply passionate about JS/TS technologies, web development, and crafting innovative eCommerce strategies.
bio_blog_purpose: This blog is my platform where I document and share my knowledge and experiences with others.
lost_message: Hmm... it seems that you're lost
return_message: But don't worry, you can find plenty of other things on my homepage.

blog.intro: I write mostly about web development, tech-related topics, and sometimes share my personal adventures. Use the search below to filter by title.

about_description: More about me and this blog
resume_description: My professional career, experiences, and skills.
